title: 3 teams map
body: Riot should do a map for 3 teams it would be really funny.{{champion:222}} {{champion:222}}

replies.body: someone already suggested that. I think 3 teams in 1 map is impossible.....What if 2 teams cooperate to eliminate the other team?
That is the funny of the game. In jung everybody is in danger and there is a lane more weak to ganks and wards are very importants
